entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
